structuresaver.structure_export_block.ex:
Click 'Export' to save the structure
file to '/structuresaver_exports'
structuresaver.structure_loader_block.ex:
Click 'Place' to load the structure
into your world. The entire structure will be placed,
not just the highlighted chunk.
structuresaver.error.no_skyblock: This command can only be used in a skyblock world.
structuresaver.command.error.team_alread: Team %s already exists! Please choose another name!
structuresaver.command.error.user_has_te: You are already in a team!
structuresaver.command.error.user_has_no: You are currently not in any team!
structuresaver.command.error.player_has_: This player is currently not in any team!
structuresaver.command.error.player_alre: This player is already invited to your team!
structuresaver.command.error.visit_own_t: You cannot visit your own team.
structuresaver.command.error.no_player_a: No player added to the team!
structuresaver.command.error.wrong_posit: Position needs to be in the spawn dimension.
structuresaver.command.error.position_to: This position is too far away from the team island.
structuresaver.command.error.remove_spaw: You cannot remove that spawn point.%s
There are not enough spawn points left.
structuresaver.command.error.user_no_pla: You are not a player, but a mere liar!
structuresaver.command.error.teleport_ac: You are not allowed to teleport across dimensions.
structuresaver.command.error.teleportati: You are not allowed to teleport in this dimension.
structuresaver.command.denied.leave_team: You are not allowed to leave your team.
structuresaver.command.denied.join_reque: You cannot send a join request to that team.
structuresaver.command.denied.create_spa: You cannot add a spawn here.
structuresaver.command.denied.reset_spaw: You cannot reset the teams spawns.
structuresaver.command.denied.modify_spa: You can't remove this spawn point.
There are too less spawn points left.
structuresaver.command.denied.add_player: You cannot add players to this team.
structuresaver.command.denied.remove_pla: You cannot remove players from this team.
structuresaver.command.disabled.teleport: You are not allowed to teleport to your home point.
structuresaver.command.disabled.accept_i: You are not allowed to accept invitations!
structuresaver.command.disabled.decline_: You are not allowed to decline invitations!
structuresaver.command.disabled.join_req: You are not allowed to send a join request!
structuresaver.command.disabled.team_joi: This team doesn't want any new member, sorry.
structuresaver.command.disabled.accept_j: You are not allowed to accept requests.
structuresaver.command.disabled.deny_joi: You are not allowed to deny requests.
structuresaver.command.disabled.visit_te: This team doesn't want any visitors, sorry.
structuresaver.command.disabled.manage_t: You are not allowed to manage teams.
structuresaver.command.disabled.send_inv: You are not allowed to send invitations.
structuresaver.command.disabled.modify_s: You are not allowed to modify spawns.
structuresaver.command.disabled.rename_t: You are not allowed to rename teams.
structuresaver.command.info.teams: There are a total of %s teams of which %s are empty.
structuresaver.command.info.visit_status: Visits by other players are currently %s.
structuresaver.command.info.toggle_visit: Visits by other players are now %s.
structuresaver.command.info.request_stat: Join requests by other players are currently %s.
structuresaver.command.info.toggle_reque: Join requests by other players are now %s.
structuresaver.command.success.export_sp: Successfully exported current spawns to config, using key '%s'
structuresaver.command.success.declined_: Successfully destroyed the invitation of team %s.
structuresaver.command.success.visit_tea: You are now a visitor of team %s.
structuresaver.command.success.join_requ: Successfully sent a request to join team %s.
structuresaver.command.success.spawn_add: Successfully added new spawn point at x %s, y %s, z %s.
structuresaver.command.success.spawn_rem: Successfully removed spawn point at x %s, y %s, z %s.
structuresaver.command.warning.edit_spaw: [WARNING] You are editing the spawn island!
structuresaver.event.join_request0: %s wants to be in your team. Type
structuresaver.event.remove_player: %s was kicked out of your team.
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.info: Shift-right click a block to set corner
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.igno: Each air block in the selected area will be ignored and not saved to the template
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.nbt_: The generated file will be a .snbt file, that means editable in a standard editor
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.save: The structure (and including spawns) will automatically added to the templates.json5 config
The structure will be saved on the server, rather than the client
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.incl: Entities like villagers, monsters, or items on the ground will be included in the structure.
structuresaver.item.structure_saver.over: If the file exists already, overwrite it.
structuresaver.structure_saver.pos: Position %s set at x %s, y %s, z %s
structuresaver.compat.disabled_managemen: This and all other team management is disabled by %s.
minemention.structuresaver.team: Mention every player in your team
